metaTitle: BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS Los Alcazares | From €324,900
metaDescription: Discover BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS in Los Alcazares, Murcia. 3-bed penthouses and apartments from €324,900. Ready 01-01-2026. By PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE.

content.heroIntro:
BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS represents an exceptional investment opportunity in the heart of Los Narejos, Los Alcazares, developed by the respected PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. This carefully curated collection features 3 premium units combining modern design with coastal living, offering either luxurious penthouses or contemporary apartments with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Built to exacting standards with sizes ranging from 97-106m², each property is strategically positioned to capture the essence of Mediterranean living while maintaining practical accessibility to all essential services.

Delivery is scheduled for January 1, 2026, giving you the perfect timeline to plan your relocation to Spain's vibrant Costa Blanca region. With prices starting from just €324,900—40% less than comparable Spanish island markets—BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS offers remarkable value without compromising on quality. The project caters to international buyers seeking both primary residences and investment properties with strong rental potential, averaging €800 per week. Located in an established international community where English is commonly spoken, this development represents both lifestyle and financial opportunity.

locationSection.intro: Los Narejos, situated in Los Alcazares, Murcia, has emerged as one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations. This charming coastal town perfectly balances authentic Spanish culture with modern international amenities, creating an ideal environment for both permanent residents and holiday home seekers. The area benefits from a Mediterranean climate, stunning Blue Flag beaches, and excellent infrastructure that connects seamlessly to major cities. Los Narejos attracts a sophisticated demographic of expats and Spanish nationals who appreciate the relaxed lifestyle, quality healthcare, international schools, and world-class golf facilities. The region has experienced consistent property value growth of +8% year-on-year, making it an increasingly attractive investment hub. With a genuine international community and widespread English language services, newcomers find the transition to Spanish life remarkably smooth and welcoming.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes drive
Golf: Several championship courses within 25 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets within 10 minutes
Schools: International schools with British curriculum available locally

propertyFeatures.intro: BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS showcases contemporary construction standards with meticulous attention to detail. The development reflects PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE's commitment to quality, incorporating modern materials and proven building techniques throughout. Residents benefit from professional project management, transparent construction timelines, and a 10-year structural warranty. The specifications balance luxury aspirations with practical Spanish living, ensuring properties appeal to discerning international buyers.

content.investmentSection: BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS represents a compelling investment opportunity in a consistently appreciating market. Los Alcazares property values have demonstrated +8% year-on-year growth, significantly outpacing many European investment markets. The development's advantageous pricing—40% below comparable Spanish island properties—combined with proven rental demand of €800 per week positions owners to achieve attractive returns. The established international community and tourism infrastructure ensure consistent demand from both holiday renters and permanent buyers. Additionally, Spain's favorable fiscal policies for foreign property investors, combined with improving infrastructure and services in Los Alcazares, create ideal conditions for long-term capital appreciation. First-time Spanish property investors and seasoned portfolio builders alike recognize the region's potential.

faqs.answer: Prices start from €324,900. The development features Penthouses and Apartments with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, ranging from 97-106m². Three units are currently available. Contact PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE directly for current availability and specific pricing for your preferred unit type.

faqs.question: When will BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS be completed?
faqs.answer: Delivery is scheduled for January 1, 2026. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific unit completion dates and payment schedules are available upon request.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS?
faqs.answer: PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE is the developer, bringing established expertise in quality residential development throughout Los Alcazares and the surrounding Murcia region. They are recognized for transparent project management and commitment to delivery timelines.

faqs.question: Is Los Alcazares a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Los Alcazares is an excellent investment destination. The area boasts an established international community where English is widely spoken, property values show +8% year-on-year appreciation, and amenities include a regional hospital within 30 minutes and Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes. The combination of lifestyle benefits and investment potential makes it highly attractive to international buyers.

faqs.question: How far is BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are accessible within 20 minutes drive, offering a perfect balance of coastal convenience without beachfront density. The location provides easy beach access while maintaining peaceful residential surroundings.

faqs.question: What amenities are near BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS?
faqs.answer: The surrounding area offers: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets within 10 minutes; Regional hospital with English-speaking doctors within 30 minutes; Several championship golf courses within 25 minutes; International schools with British curriculum; and established restaurants and local markets throughout Los Alcazares.

content.conclusion: BELICH TOURISTIC APARTMENTS by PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE represents the ideal convergence of lifestyle enhancement and financial opportunity. Whether you seek a permanent Mediterranean residence, a vacation retreat, or an investment property with proven rental potential, this development delivers on all fronts. The combination of competitive pricing, established international community, excellent amenities, and consistent market growth makes this an opportunity worth serious consideration. Don't delay—with only 3 units available and delivery approaching January 2026, inventory is limited. Contact PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE today via WhatsApp to discuss your specific requirements, arrange property viewings, and secure your place in this exclusive development. Your Costa Blanca dream awaits.
